title: Type for web?
content:
Hey folks

I need to know which fonts would be good to use as a choice for an online typeface? Its for a corporate site!

Any suggestions?
author: TheMark

comments.content: You're going to have to give us a bit more to go on other than "it's a commercial web site"

\>\> Its for a corporate site!

\> Helvetica

Or Arial if it's a Microsoft shop.
